mapper.select:
SELECT cf.feedback_number, cf.user_id, cf.title, cf.content, cf.feedback_date, cf.feedback_count, fr.response_content FROM customer_feedback cf LEFT JOIN feedback_response fr ON cf.feedback_number = fr.feedback_number WHERE 1 = 1
AND cf.user_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND cf.title LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND cf.content LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND cf.feedback_date >= #{feedbackDate}
ORDER BY cf.feedback_number
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feedback_response (response_number, feedback_number, user_id, response_content, response_date) VALUES (response_seq.NEXTVAL, #{feedbackNumber}, 'admin', #{responseContent}, SYSDATE)
